body_html:
This seems like the only use of requireOperation. Might be better to inline it and tailor the exception message> Something like:

if (op_handle == 0) {
  throwException(env, kIllegalStateException, "control input is not valid, perhaps the Graph containing it has been closed()?");
  return;
}
TF_Operation* control = reinterpret_cast<TF_Operation*>(op_handle);
